entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Salluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:03 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -28.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Salluit Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -28.2°C
Pressure: 102.5 kPa
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -42
Dewpoint: -31.2°C
Wind: SW 23 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Blowing snow overnight. Wind south 50 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Blizzard changing to snow near noon and ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
